resources.string:
**Terms of Use**
Thank you for using our application. Please read and understand the following terms before using the application:
1. Health Usage: This application is provided for general informational purposes only and is not intended to diagnose or treat any medical condition. You should consult a qualified healthcare professional before making any decisions or taking any actions related to your health.
2. Personal Data: Some personal information may be requested from the user for registration or customization purposes. We respect the privacy of our users and are committed to protecting and securing their personal data in accordance with our privacy policy.
3. Proper Usage: You must comply with applicable laws and regulations while using the application. The application must not be used for any illegal or unethical purposes.
4. Liability: We are not liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of this application or reliance on the information provided in it.
Please read and accept the terms of use before using the application.
Please customize this text according to the needs and requirements of your specific application. After adding this text, you can display it to users when they start using the application and request their agreement to the terms before proceeding.
In the last 24 hours I felt: Satisfied/Unsatisfied
Are you ready to start your well-being test ?
Who is around you right now?
